edu.hm.cs.kniffel.controller.rules

Interface Rule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRule, RuleBonus, RuleChance, RuleFourOfAKind, RuleFullHouse, RuleLargeStraight, RuleNumber, RuleSmallStraight, RuleThreeOfAKind, RuleYahtzee

    public interface Rule
    A named rule which calculates the points a player gets if he chooses to score.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Thomas Pfaffinger, thomas.pfaffinger@hm.edu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check(ReadonlyDiceCup diceCup)
      Checks weather scoring this rule would yield any points.
      java.lang.String getName()
      The name of this Rule.
      ScoreboardSection getSection()
      This rules section, meaning its position on the Scoreboard.
      int numPoints(ReadonlyDiceCup diceCup)
      The number of points this rule yields in the current context.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of this Rule.
        Returns:
        the name of this Rule

      • check

        boolean check(ReadonlyDiceCup diceCup)
        Checks weather scoring this rule would yield any points.
        Parameters:
        diceCup - The DiceCup with all currently active dices
        Returns:
        true if the rule would yield any points, false otherwise

      • numPoints

        int numPoints(ReadonlyDiceCup diceCup)
        The number of points this rule yields in the current context. Will be 0 if check returns false.
        Parameters:
        diceCup - The DiceCup with all currently active dices
        Returns:
        Number of points

      • getSection

        ScoreboardSection getSection()
        This rules section, meaning its position on the Scoreboard.
        Returns:
        this rules section
